main event: A single object was observed on radar leaving a white vapor trail in Gransmere, N.J.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on 6 November 1957 at 0935,The observation lasted for 12 minutes,The object appeared to be the size of a dime,The object was possibly a balloon according to conclusions,The radar lost track of the object due to fading.
sighted object: one object with a white vapor trail
